diagnostic_insight.zh: 天向西轉，水向東流，氣場呈現『背道而馳』之象。這並非單純的外在爭執，而是你的內在頻率與當前環境產生了根本性的錯位。你感覺周遭充滿阻力，彷彿逆水行舟，越是用力辯解，誤解反而越深。這是因為能量流向不合，強行溝通只會引發更大的摩擦。
diagnostic_insight.en: Heaven moves west, water flows east; the energy field shows a sign of 'divergence'. This is not merely external dispute, but a fundamental misalignment between your internal frequency and the current environment. You feel resistance everywhere, like rowing upstream; the harder you try to explain, the deeper the misunderstanding. The energy flows are incompatible, and forced communication only creates more friction.

action_guidance.zh: 此時『止』大於『行』。在氣場不合時，尋求勝利只會帶來悔恨。建議暫停所有爭辯與推進，退回到安全邊界內進行觀照。若此卦指向處理事務，請尋找公正的第三方或中間人作為緩衝。不要試圖獨自扭轉局勢，妥協不是認輸，而是為了保存能量。
action_guidance.en: At this time, 'stopping' is more important than 'acting'. Seeking victory when energies are misaligned only brings regret. It is recommended to pause all arguments and advancements, retreating to a safe boundary for observation. If you must handle affairs, seek a neutral third party as a buffer. Do not try to turn the tide alone; compromise is not defeat, but a way to preserve energy.

primary.en: Heaven and Water moving apart, each following its own course.

secondary.zh: 身處異鄉的孤獨旅人，語言不通。
secondary.en: A lonely traveler in a foreign land, unable to communicate.

contraindications: 避免開啟新的爭論 (Avoid starting new arguments)
禁止強行推進計畫 (Forbid forcing plans forward)
不宜涉險渡河 (Not suitable for crossing great rivers/risks)
